author: Albert Einstein
quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.

author: Walt Disney
quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: In order to carry a positive action, we must develop here a positive vision.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Well done is better than well said.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.

author: Les Brown
quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.

author: Babe Ruth
quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

author: Robert H. Schuller
quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.

author: Wayne Dyer
quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

author: Arthur Ashe
quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.

author: George Eliot
quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.

author: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

author: Bruce Lee
quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

author: John Wooden
quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

author: Confucius
quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
